summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 725 m), feels like temperature (up 1.6°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 775.2m higher than yesterday, 133.5m lower than the past week, 724.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 2040m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, humidity will be high and noticeable. A few light raindrops may fall, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. Weather could become unsettled.
